document_data.name: Daryth
document_data.mainbody: '''Daryth''' was a [[thief]] from [[Calimshan]] who aided [[Tristan Kendrick]] of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]]..
document_data.Description: Like most [[Calishite]]s, Daryth was deeply tan with dark eyes.
document_data.Possessions: Daryth wore a bright red [[cloak]] and wielded a curved [[dagger]].{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|2430}} ''[[Gloves of thievery]]'' came into his possession while exploring the sunken castle of [[Caer Alisynn]], the enchanted burial place of [[Alisynn]], wife of the ancient hero [[Cymrych Hugh]].<ref>
document_data.History:
Daryth was trained as a thief, spy and assassin in the [[Academy of Stealth]] in Calimshan, but had to run away from the [[Pasha]] and his former life because he got into trouble over some properties he had acquired.{{Cite digital book/Darkwalker on Moonshae|2846}}

In the {{YearlinkName|1345}}, Daryth arrived on the Moonshaes in the ship ''[[Silver Crescent]]'' and attended the Festival of the Spring Equinox on [[Gwynneth]]. During the festival, Daryth robbed Tristan Kendrick while the prince was haggling with the [[halfling]] [[Pawldo]] over the [[moorhound]] [[Canthus]]. Later, Tristan saved Daryth's life by asking his father, [[Bryon Kendrick]] to appoint Daryth as the royal houndmaster of [[Caer Corwell]].
